items.description: Engineered for any hunting situation, in any environment, or backyard recreational use. The huge draw length range of 12 inches and 63 pounds of draw weight is quickly and easily adjusted without the need of a bow press.

At 6 pounds and under, the Hunting Rifle is designed to combat elevation and elements while maintaining the performance of a factory blueprinted Hunting Rifle action. The carbon fiber wrapped stainless steel barrel and melonite skeletonized receiver minimize weight for success on any mountain hunt.
The Hunting Shotgun is a pump action 12 gauge featuring a 3-inch chamber and a 22-inch vent rib barrel equipped with a green fiber optic sight.
